updates.title: Microsoft Copilot in Intune
updates.subtitle: Explore Intune data with natural language
updates.content: You can now use Microsoft Copilot in Intune to explore your Intune data using natural language, take action on the results, manage policies and settings, understand your security posture, and troubleshoot device issues.
features: Explore your Intune data using natural language queries
Conversational chat experience for device troubleshooting
